solution_line_template: Andy weighed {initial_weight} + {weight_gain} = <<{initial_weight}+{weight_gain}={post_growth_weight}>>{post_growth_weight} pounds after growing taller.
An eighth of his weight is {weight_loss_fraction} x {post_growth_weight} = <<{weight_loss_fraction}*{post_growth_weight}={one_month_loss}>>{one_month_loss} pounds.
Over the next {months} months, Andy lost {one_month_loss} x {months} = <<{one_month_loss}*{months}={total_loss}>>{total_loss} pounds.
Andy weighs {initial_weight} - {final_weight} = <<{initial_weight}-{final_weight}={weight_difference}>>{weight_difference} pounds less than at the beginning of the year.
